ActorFrame.children:
<Layer
			File="stars"
			InitCommand="%function(self) prefix_stars = self; end"
			OnCommand=""
			HideCommand="%function(self)
				if prefix_brightness then
					if prefix_brightness > 0 then
						prefix_brightness = prefix_brightness - 2;
						self:diffusealpha(prefix_brightness/100);
						self:sleep(0.02);
						self:queuecommand('Hide');
					end
				end
			end"
			ShowCommand="%function(self)
				if prefix_brightness then
					if prefix_brightness < 100 then
						prefix_brightness = prefix_brightness + 2;
						self:diffusealpha(prefix_brightness/100);
						self:sleep(0.02);
						self:queuecommand('Hide');
					end
				end
			end"
		/>
